dc_description_s: Border of views of towns and local costumes. Includes illustrations of ships, sea monsters, and includes a sea battle in the bottom left corner. Title cartouche includes 1626 date. From "Atlantis maioris appendix", Johannes Janssonius, 1630. 1 map; 47 x 34 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664.,Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Atlantis Maioris Appendix, 1630.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner.
